snippet: The Canadian government’s enthusiasm for the conflict has puzzled and angered many in the country, where shows of patriotism are more subdued than they are south of the border.
abstract: Dunvegan Journal; Canadian government is devoting surprising attention to the bicentennial of War of 1812, which it describes bluntly as an act of American aggression against Canada.
lead_paragraph: The Canadian government’s enthusiasm for the conflict has puzzled and angered many in the country, where shows of patriotism are more subdued than they are south of the border.

headline.seo: Canada Highlights War of 1812, Casting U.S. as Aggressor
headline.main: Canada Puts Spotlight on War of 1812, With U.S. as Villain
headline.print_headline: Canada Puts Spotlight On War of 1812, With U.S. as Villain
